body.name: HOXXME Shredded Memory Foam Pillows for Sleeping, Cooling Bamboo Memory Foam Bed Pillow 2 Pack, King Size Firm Pillow Gel for Neck Support, Hotel Quality Bed Rest Pillow Set of 2
features: ⭐Shredded Memory Foam Bed Pillow Sets : If you are looking for firm, yet soft support bed pillows, these memory foam pillows king size wit mix of Shredded memory foam and down alternative filling will give you prefect amount of firmness and supportive.

⭐Adjustable Height and Support for All Sleepers : The memory foam fillings for the best gel bed pillow for sleeping can be added or removed to customize the height and firmness, no matter you are a side sleeper / back / stomach sleeper, enjoy the luxury experience of a five-star hotel at home every night.

Cooling Sleep Experience with Bamboo Cover: our cooling pillow use bamboo cover which is breathable, soft and noise-free, cooling for hot sleepers, this material is also durable for years use, worth every penny of it.

⭐Easy Care and Vacuum pack: The pillow case is zipper removable and machine washable, tumber dry on low temperature. Each pillow comes vacuum sealed and rolled flat, let the pillow air out for 24 hours, press, squeeze, fold for a while, or put it in the dryer for 3-5 minutes to make it fluffy.

⭐Luxury pillows KING size 2 pack: This is not only perfect bed pillows for sleeping, also back pillow for sitting in bed, long pillow for bed, bed rest pillow,reading pillow for bed adult,back rest pillow. Also ideal for birthday gift, Christmas gift, Father's Day gift to friends and families.

How to make our pillow fluffy
KING Size (20 x 36 inch) memory foam bed pillows SET OF 2

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bamboo body pillow
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this pillow… Not only was it economically priced but I usually find it incredibly difficult to find a pillow that is actually comfortable to sleep on and this one is completely adjustable. The pieces of memory foam inside of it are able to be adjusted and taken out or added in to your comfort level. Would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for this kind of pillow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thick and fluffy
reviews.reviewText: Arrived all flat in a thick plastic bag and rolled up in a zippered case. Once opened it started to get air back and fluff up. It does have a bit of a chemical smell at first, just like EVERY new foam product does. It goes away by the time the pillow finishes fluffing up. I left it out for 2 days and it is very thick. A smaller person may not like it because it is quite tall and thick around, it has some weight to it from the filling. We have purchased two now and we really like them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect body pillow
reviews.reviewText: I got this pillow as a pregnancy pillow and love it. It’s so soft and not lumpy and fluffed right up after unpackaging. The cover comes off and is washable which is a big plus and it’s a perfect size. Wish I bought this sooner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So many reviews stating the pillow was flat so I really maneuvered It around and it’s super thick! Very soft and I do feel cooler with this pillow than my usual wal-mart ones. Also to add, I’m 5’9 and the pillow is so thick, I don’t think a smaller person could accommodate their leg wrapped around this pillow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and quality
reviews.reviewText: So far, I am enjoying my purchase of this body pillow with shredded memory foam. It's the perfect purchase I was looking for. I can't complain about the comfort and quality. I would highly recommend for the next person looking to replace or add on a body pillow for your nighttime slumber.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Needs more filling
reviews.reviewText: This is a review for HOXXME Body Pillow for Adults Shredded Memory Foam Long Full Body Pillow for Sleeping with Breathable Bamboo Cover Firm Hug Large Pillows for Side Sleepers 20x54When I opened the pillow from the package, it was super flat, but I left it out for a week now, and it has expanded pretty good, but could use a lot more filling. If you grab the pillow by the end, and let all the stuffing settle, there is a good chunk of loose fabric in your hand. In order for this to be comfortable, I will have to fold the fabric over, and stuff the pillow in another case.I am not sure if this is normal for body pillows these days, but I did expect it to be more full.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I have bought the exact same pillow, not this one, from Wally World for years. Even after it has caused me pain in my neck, I still have bought the same one. Seeing these pillows I figured there would be no great loss in trying them out. Oh my was I surprised.First of all, remember to follow the instructions and allow the pillow to settle itself back into shape. I actually gave it a couple days and not saying that extra day made a difference, but not saying it didn't either.I was concerned as to me the pillow felt hard, but it really isn't. Once I put my head down on it you could feel that it is actually soft, but not overly soft. Compared to the pillows I have used before, and there have been several, these compare to the ones that were given to me when I stayed in a high priced hotel once.While they are listed as king size, they are very thick so you will need a really large pillow case, maybe made for thick king size pillows. If you stuff it into a regular king size pillow case you're probably not going to be getting the full effect of the pillow. I say this as I don't have anything but standard king size pillow cases and using one of them, as to compared to not using a pillow case at all, the is some difference in the feel of the pillow. It feels a bit softer when it is not jammed into the undersized pillow case. I am going to find a good pillow case to put it in as well as some rough feeling case isn't going to do me any favors either.I have only slept on this pillow a few times as of this writing, but I haven't woke up in pain like I would with my other pillows. Is this going to eliminate all my neck pain, probably not as some of it comes from arthritis in my neck, but with any luck it might just help lessen it a bit.I have high hopes for this pillow and can't wait to get some more time using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems larger than a standard body pillow
reviews.reviewText: It's been a long time since I've had a body pillow, and I've never had memory foam, so I thought this would be a great addition to my bed. It took a long time to fully expand from being vacuum sealed (2-3 days), but it had a good amount of firmness and softness when it did. I tried to put an old body pillow cover on this pillow, but it was for a standard size and didn't fit this one, so I'm led to believe that this one is a little bit larger than what would be considered standard. However, using two king-sized pillowcases on either end was fine because they fit and matched my bedding.
